## On CRAN

| Package                                                | Description                                                                                               |
|---------------------|---------------------------------------------------|
| [`pysparklyr`](/packages/pysparklyr/index.md)     | Integrate `sparklyr` with Spark Connect and Databricks Connect (v2)                                       |
| [`sparkxgb`](/packages/sparkxgb/index.md)       | A `sparklyr` extension that provides an interface to [XGBoost](https://github.com/dmlc/xgboost) on Spark. |
| [`graphframes`](/packages/graphframes/index.md) | Enables graph analysis in Spark via GraphFrames                                                           |

## On Github

| Package                                        | Description                                                                                                                                            |
|----------------------|--------------------------------------------------|
| [`sparktf`](/packages/sparktf/index.md) | Allows writing of Spark DataFrame's to TFRecord, the recommended format for persisting data to be used in training with TensorFlow                     |
| [`mleap`](/packages/mleap/index.md)     | A `sparklyr` extension that provides an interface to [MLeap](https://github.com/combust/mleap), which allows us to take Spark pipelines to production. |
